page.title: 09The People of West Overton.
page.content: Most people's{houses}are between 50 and 400 years old, but a few people's houses are less than 8 years old. Everybody has lived here for more than two years. All the people say they like the village and the countryside. The church is regularly visited by most people. Only four people regularly go to the local village shop for all their shopping, and many people don't travel on local buses. Most people have a car of their own, but others would like to see more{transport provided. Most of the people think that their neighbours are nice and friendly. Some people take part in{local {activities}like singing in the church choir, horse riding, girl guides, youth club, brownies and cubs.
